mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MENTORING ( MENTORING_NUMBER, MENTORING_NAME, MENTORING_LIMIT, MENTORING_CONTENT, MENTORING_PHOTO, MENTORING_PRICE, MENTOR_ID, MENTORING_BEGIN_DATE, MENTORING_END_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_MENTORING.NEXTVAL, #{mentoring_name}, #{mentoring_limit}, #{mentoring_content}, #{mentoring_photo}, #{mentoring_price}, #{mentor_id}, #{mentoring_begin_date}, #{mentoring_end_date} )
mapper.select: SELECT NAME, MENTORING_NUMBER, MENTORING_NAME, MENTORING_LIMIT, MENTORING_CONTENT, MENTORING_PHOTO, MENTORING_PRICE, MENTORING_DATA, MENTORING_REQUEST, MENTOR_ID, MENTORING_END_DATE, MENTORING_BEGIN_DATE, MENTEEID, MEN_START, MET_END, ID FROM MYMENTORINGVU WHERE ID=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE MENTORING SET MENTORING_NAME =#{mentoring_name}, MENTORING_LIMIT =#{mentoring_limit}, MENTORING_CONTENT =#{mentoring_content}, MENTORING_PHOTO=#{mentoring_photo}, MENTORING_PRICE=#{mentoring_price}, MENTORING_DATA=#{mentoring_data}, MENTORING_REQUEST=#{mentoring_request}, MENTORING_BEGIN_DATE=#{mentoring_begin_date}, MENTORING_END_DATE=#{mentoring_end_date} WHERE MENTORING_NUMBER=#{mentoring_number}
mapper.select: SELECT MENTORING_NUMBER, MENTORING_NAME, MENTORING_LIMIT, MENTORING_CONTENT, MENTORING_PHOTO, MENTORING_PRICE, MENTORING_DATA, MENTORING_REQUEST, MENTOR_ID, TO_CHAR(MENTORING_BEGIN_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS "mentoring_begin_date", TO_CHAR(MENTORING_END_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS "mentoring_end_date", MENTORING_CLICK, MENTORING_OPEN_DATE FROM MENTORING WHERE MENTORING_NUMBER = #{mentoring_number}
